General.Name: TVI Pacific Inc
General.Description: TVI Pacific Inc., a resource company, engages in the exploration, production, and development of resource projects in the Philippines. It primarily explores for gold, silver, copper, zinc, nickel, limestone deposits. The company was formerly known as TVI Copper Inc. and changed its name to TVI Pacific Inc. in July 1994. TVI Pacific Inc. was incorporated in 1987 and is headquartered in Calgary, Canada.
General.Address: 505 - 2nd Street SW, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2P 1N8
